remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为 `true` ，则将重新编译以前编译过的任何组件。If this property is `true`, any previously compiled components will be recompiled. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 如果已指定，则编译的程序集将拥有固定的名称。

span.span: If specified, the compiled assemblies will be given fixed names.

value.span: 如果应该为应用程序中的每个页面生成一个程序集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if one assembly should be generated for each page in the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个程序集都命名为带有原始页的虚拟路径，除非该名称超出文件名的操作系统限制，在这种情况下，将生成哈希并将其用于程序集名称。Each assembly is named with the virtual path of the original page unless the name would exceed the operating system limit for file names, in which case a hash is generated and used for the assembly name. 不能将此属性用于就地编译;就地编译采用编译批处理模式的配置设置。You cannot use this property for in-place compilation; in-place compilation honors configuration settings for compilation batch mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VirtualPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 要编译的应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the application to be compiled.

summary.span: 如果 PhysicalDir 用于查找应用程序，则指定

span.span: If PhysicalDir is used to locate the application is specified.

summary.span: 否则，将使用 IIS 元数据库，并假定应用程序位于默认站点中（“/LM/W3SVC/1/Root”下）。

span.span: Otherwise, the IIS metabase is used, and the application is assumed to be in the default site (under "/LM/W3SVC/1/Root").

value.span: 要编译的应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the application to be compiled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 `PhysicalPath`，则物理路径将用于查找应用程序。If `PhysicalPath` specified, the physical path is used to locate the application. 否则，将使用 IIS 元数据库，并假定应用程序位于默认站点中。Otherwise, the IIS metabase is used, and the application is assumed to be in the default site.
